project.name: J-C191A-POIX-02-ST03-DT03-DF06-CF04-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source, and creates a string array based on the value. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32749 or greater, the resultant value underflows and becomes positive. This results in an infinite loop.

iopair.name: J-C191A-POIX-02-ST03-DT03-DF06-CF04-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: convert a .doc to HTML Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="10" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="32767" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^some_value\[20\] : 20$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_jCYVwGyEWgeqOfMwhyvC AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_ekZxStRz8s OR (NOT finished_2BDYwJHfJN AND NOT (controlled_exit_1u1ezkVLDP OR continued_execution_QBUi4Kciuo)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_ekZxStRz8s OR (NOT finished_2BDYwJHfJN AND NOT (controlled_exit_1u1ezkVLDP OR continued_execution_QBUi4Kciuo))) OR controlled_exit_1u1ezkVLDP)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_ekZxStRz8s OR (NOT finished_2BDYwJHfJN AND NOT (controlled_exit_1u1ezkVLDP OR continued_execution_QBUi4Kciuo)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_ekZxStRz8s OR (NOT finished_2BDYwJHfJN AND NOT (controlled_exit_1u1ezkVLDP OR continued_execution_QBUi4Kciuo))) OR controlled_exit_1u1ezkVLDP))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
